name: Barney Error (Gamer6862)
description:
Maded in PowerPoint 2006

This is the first Barney Error that i made,more Barney Errors are coming soon...¿or not?

hope you enjoy this game!

Creator : Gamer6862

if anyone does not know how to use PowerPoint :

Press the button that says : ''presentation with slides'' and the game will put on FULL SCREEN and it will start to work but you need to be on the first slide and you can play the game.
